name: Autos
description:
The game contains five modes :



Truck Challenge : Deliver all the cargos in tough places but don't fall the goods. (150 Levels)



Car Park Drift :Take the Challenge and make your favorite donuts.


Racing : It's time for sport cars and be ready for competition.



Rally : Use your driving focus and avoid the hard turn.



Driving : Deliver the goods with light and heavy vehicles in open world. will be available "Next Update"
